医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
健康素养差距助长了初级保健患者对抗生素不切实际的期望研究表明，超过 93% 的初级保健患者希望使用抗生素来治疗常见症状，尤其是在公立诊所，而缺乏教育和健康素养导致了这些不切实际的期望。对抗生素风险的了解是影响患者需求的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Health-literacy-gaps-fuel-unrealistic-antibiotic-expectations-in-primary-care-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Health-literacy-gaps-fuel-unrealistic-antibiotic-expectations-in-primary-care-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f1798f2-32ac-4d10-b755-c686f85ba6f8 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Health literacy gaps fuel unrealistic antibiotic expectations in primary care patients
饮食和肠道菌群失调与类风湿性关节炎有关综述强调了肠道菌群失调和饮食因素如何与类风湿性关节炎相关，影响疾病进展和炎症。研究人员探索特定饮食如何帮助调节肠道微生物组以改善症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Diet-and-gut-dysbiosis-linked-to-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Diet-and-gut-dysbiosis-linked-to-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c500404f-024e-4f45-9f24-677376468059 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 19:59:00 -0400 Diet and gut dysbiosis linked to rheumatoid arthritis
针对下呼吸道感染的新型呼吸检测在重症监护环境中显示出 100% 的敏感性研究人员开发了一种基于呼吸的体外检测方法，通过测量中性粒细胞弹性蛋白酶活性来准确检测下呼吸道感染（LRTI）。这种非侵入性测试具有很高的诊断灵敏度，可能会彻底改变 LRTI 检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/New-breath-based-test-for-lower-respiratory-tract-infections-shows-10025-sensitivity-in-ritic-care-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/New-breath-based-test-for-lower-respiratory-tract-infections-shows-10025-sensitivity-in-ritic-care-settings.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07c97c66-5299-4a9b-b6f4-79251ac338bf Sun, 29 Sep 2024 19:41:00 -0400 New breath-based test for lower respiratory tract infections shows 100% sensitivity in critical care settings
从患者到医生：EJ Beck 在 NYU Langone Health 的医疗之旅EJ Beck 小时候在纽约大学兰格尼健康中心接受了一种罕见的儿童甲状腺癌的治疗。大约 10 年后，贝克的扫描结果宣布她已痊愈，她被一所医学院录取为她的第一选择：纽约大学格罗斯曼医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/From-病人到医生-EJ-Becks-medical-journey-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/From-病人到医生-EJ-Becks-medical-journey-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cd29ed9-16ed-4f31-9597-983cefb2801a Fri, 27 Sep 2024 23:11:00 -0400 From patient to physician: EJ Beck's medical journey at NYU Langone Health
加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的研究人员在 ASTRO 展示放射肿瘤学的进展加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心专门从事放射治疗的研究人员和医生将在 9 月 29 日于华盛顿特区举行的第 66 届美国放射肿瘤学会 (ASTRO) 年度会议上展示最新放射肿瘤学研究和临床试验结果的数据至 10 月 2 日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/UCLA-Health-researchers-showcase-advances-in-radiation-oncology-at-ASTRO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/UCLA-Health-researchers-showcase-advances-in-radiation-oncology-at-ASTRO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=953a764e-229f-4f65-b265-2c99b6a96fed Fri, 27 Sep 2024 23:06:44 -0400 UCLA Health researchers showcase advances in radiation oncology at ASTRO
创新的基因组方法识别罕见的长 QT 综合征携带者对基因组内共享片段的创新分析——；遥远“相关性”的指示-；已经发现了未确诊的长 QT 综合征病例，这是一种罕见的疾病，可导致心律异常、昏厥和心源性猝死。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Innovative-genomic-approach-identizes-rare-Long-QT-syndrome-riers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Innovative-genomic-approach-identizes-rare-Long-QT-syndrome-carriers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90afe417-d790-47ae-bda8-7cd7bb3e7020 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Innovative genomic approach identifies rare Long QT syndrome carriers
德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心推出新的癌症教育期刊德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心今天宣布推出其首份学术期刊《癌症教育与质量改进进展》(ACE-QI)。该杂志将为肿瘤学提供者社区发布研究、培训计划摘要和质量改进干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/University-of-Texas-MD-Anderson-Cancer-Center-launches-new-journal-on-cancer-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/University-of-Texas-MD-Anderson-Cancer-Center-launches-new-journal-on-cancer-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=949edea9-6dfa-4a38-ad81-5773555abd29 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:56:13 -0400 University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center launches new journal on cancer education
生物钟紊乱与结直肠癌加速进展有关加州大学欧文分校的研究揭示了生物钟（人体内部 24 小时生物起搏器）的破坏如何通过影响肠道微生物组和肠道屏障功能来加速结直肠癌的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Disruption-of-circadian-clock-linked-to-accelerated-colorectal-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Disruption-of-circadian-clock-linked-to-accelerated-colorectal-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c525eddf-fd61-429f-930f-3e28eb86d48a Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Disruption of circadian clock linked to accelerated colorectal cancer progression
研究揭示学校反欺凌和性骚扰教育的差距根据在奥兰治县会议中心举行的美国儿科学会 2024 年全国会议暨展览期间发表的研究，虽然美国学校的暴力预防教育有所增加，但目前只有十分之一的学校要求在课堂上进行暴力预防讨论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-reveals-gaps-in-anti-bullying-and- Sex-harassment-education-in-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-reveals-gaps-in-anti-bullying-and- Sex-harassment-education-in-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc58eb04-0a38-4dba-81de-94ed1c388767 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:49:00 -0400 Study reveals gaps in anti-bullying and sexual harassment education in schools
超吸收性聚合物珠与儿童肠梗阻病例增加有关在过去的十年里，吸水珠对儿童的危害越来越大，因为吞下吸水珠的儿童可能会出现肠梗阻等危及生命的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Superabsorbent-polymer-beads-linked-to-increasing-cases-of-bowel-obstruction-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Superabsorbent-polymer-beads-linked-to-increasing-cases-of-bowel-obstruction-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=394ef5f4-d3af-4db1-8983-a7655ba53f30 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:46:38 -0400 Superabsorbent polymer beads linked to increasing cases of bowel obstruction in children
